official_title: A bill to amend the United States Housing Act of 1937 and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the United States Housing Act of 1937 to allow an owner of an existing housing project who enters into a contract for rental subsidies with a public housing agency to terminate tenancy of a project unit upon the expiration of the lease for such unit.

titles.title: A bill to amend the United States Housing Act of 1937 and for other purposes.
